Word: Da Capo al fine (D.C. al fine)

Definition: Play the first note and hold for value of both
Hold for longer than written value
Repeat the music between the dots
Play one octave higher or lower than written
literally ‘small andante’; slightly faster OR slower than ‘andante’ (walking pace)
rather broadly (i.e. not as slow as ‘largo’)
hold for full value of note / play note with a slight pressure
with a minim beat in 2/2 (usually faster than 4/4)
